H0.text: Which chain of European retailers began with a store near a crossroads in Annecy, France in 1958. Carrefour

H1.text: Which chain of European retailers began with a store near a crossroads in Annecy, France in 1958. Auchan

H2.text: Which chain of European retailers began with a store near a crossroads in Annecy, France in 1958. Casino Group

H3.text: Which chain of European retailers began with a store near a crossroads in Annecy, France in 1958. Pryca

A4.text: The first Carrefour shop (not a hypermarket) opened in 1960, within suburban Annecy, near a crossroads.
